Name: The Most Boring Game Ever
About the game: Welcome to the most boring game ever. An experimental clicker simulation. Tired of fun? Just click away with a game that is meant to be boring. This game was made at a game jam as an experiment. We asked ourselves the important question. What if a game was designed to be boring? The results are here. The game is free to play so download and enjoy.
